p: Pyrethroids are the insecticides of choice for mosquito control primarily because of their superior human and environment safety records ( Adedayo et al. 2012). Besides, the use of insecticide mixtures and their periodic rotation, integrated vector management, involving biopesticides/essential oils of plant origins could be the answer for preventing/ delaying development of resistance in mosquitoes ( Brogdon and Allister 1998).
